column5: Went to the toy store today and brought a new baby home. A 50" Panasonic Viera Plasma and a nice stand to sit it on.  So it's out wirh the old.    And in with the new.    Just finished watching the Leafs lose, but they looked dang good doing it!!!  Tomorrow it's NASCAR at Talladega!!!!
Nice upgrade. We have a 48" LG and I love it.

now thats what i'm talkin about !!!! Wait till ya see WFN in HD !!! I have a 47 in the living room. and a 56 with 1000 system with BluRay in my Theater room downstairs.Popcorn and Blurays all winter long !!! What a life
VHS? NAH it's Beta!!!!!  It needs upgraing too. I ran out of funds though so it will have to wait.
I'm having trouble falling asleep tonight. It's like Xmas eve for Nascar fans. Enjoy Drifter..
I'm thinkin maybe I'll get the car out and bring talladaga back to what it's supposed to be....
Nice Dave! I recently picked up a 50in Panny VT Series a few months ago..  Talladega should look great tomorrow!!!  (After I'm done fishing of course)
Very nice, I'll be watching Talladaga on my 52 inch LG tomorrow too.  That stone foot is cool!!!  Joey
It's actually natural. I found it up around Great Bear Lake. I have no idea how it was formed, but it's really cool.

Good choice. I got the 46 incher (same model) a year ago and love it. Had a warrantee issue with a screen component (a small flaw in the image) but they did a great job of dealing with it. At first I was a little ticked when the dealer told me I had to contact a special warrantee department but he gave me an email to use and I almost immediately got a phone call from a pleasant and knowledgable feller. The guy asked me to send digipics of the screen problem if I could. I got a message back within 24 hours saying the parts had been shipped and repairs were arranged and the local service rep would be contacting me to do an in house fix. All done within 48 hours. I was impressed. Worked flawlessly since.  JF
Nice Dave Will we have to turn the TV off to run the coffee machine next fall? Or will there be a new genny as well?
You'll have to sleep outside 'cause there'll be a 50" TV in your bed.
Just what I was thinking too.  That's old school
Hey, some of my best porn is on VHS!!!! Besides that piece of equipment plays them DVD things too.
